name: xdc-monitor
description: A Node.js blockchain monitoring system for XDC Network

scripts.logs:view: tail -f logs/$(date +%Y-%m-%d)/*.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No logs for today yet. Logs will be created when app starts.'
scripts.logs:view-errors: tail -f logs/$(date +%Y-%m-%d)/error.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No error logs for today yet.'
scripts.logs:view-app: tail -f logs/$(date +%Y-%m-%d)/app.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No app logs for today yet.'
scripts.logs:view-debug: tail -f logs/$(date +%Y-%m-%d)/debug.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No debug logs for today yet. Enable with LOG_LEVEL=debug.'
scripts.logs:view-combined: tail -f logs/$(date +%Y-%m-%d)/combined.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No combined logs for today yet.'
scripts.logs:view-yesterday: tail -f logs/$(date -d yesterday +%Y-%m-%d)/*.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No logs for yesterday.'
scripts.logs:view-day: echo 'Usage: yarn logs:view-day YYYY-MM-DD' && echo 'Example: yarn logs:view-day 2024-01-15'
scripts.logs:clear: rm -rf logs/20* && echo 'All daily log directories cleared.'
scripts.logs:archive: mkdir -p logs/archive/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S) && mv logs/20* logs/archive/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)/ 2>/dev/null && echo 'Daily logs archived' || echo 'No logs to archive'
scripts.logs:size: du -sh logs/ 2>/dev/null | head -1 && echo 'Daily breakdown:' && du -sh logs/20* 2>/dev/null | tail -10 || echo 'No logs directory yet'
scripts.logs:cleanup-old: find logs/ -maxdepth 1 -type d -name '20*' -mtime +30 -exec rm -rf {} \; && echo 'Cleaned up logs older than 30 days'

author: XDC Monitor Team
